SEARCH
Package careerhub.models

Class Student

java.lang.Object
careerhub.models.User
careerhub.models.Student
public class Student extends User
Represents a Student user in the Internship Management System. Students may view internship opportunities, apply for them (subject to eligibility rules), withdraw applications, and accept a single internship placement.

This class also stores last-used filter preferences for student menu navigation, as well as lists of applied internships and any accepted placement ID.

    • getMajor

      public String getMajor()

      Returns:

    • canApplyLevel

      public boolean canApplyLevel(String level)
      Determines whether a student is eligible to apply for an internship based on academic level requirements.

      Assignment rules:

      • Year 1–2: may only apply to BASIC level internships
      • Year 3–4: may apply to any level
      Parameters:
      level - internship level text
      Returns:
      true if the student can apply for this level

    • canApplyMore

      public boolean canApplyMore()
      Determines whether the student may apply for more internships.

      Students may have at most 3 active applications and cannot apply to any more once they have accepted a placement.

      Returns:
      true if the student may submit another application

    • apply

      public void apply(String internshipId)
      Adds an internship ID to the list of applied internships, if not already present.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - ID of the internship being applied for

    • applySilently

      public void applySilently(String internshipId)
      Adds an internship application without validation. Used when loading persistent data from files to restore application history.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - internship ID to add

    • withdrawApplication

      public void withdrawApplication(String internshipId)
      Removes an internship from the student's active applications.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - ID of internship to withdraw from

    • acceptPlacement

      public void acceptPlacement(String internshipId)
      Records that the student has accepted a specific internship placement. Only one internship may be accepted.
      Parameters:
      internshipId - ID of the accepted internship

    • getAcceptedInternshipId

      public String getAcceptedInternshipId()
